00007 #ifndef SAGA_PACKAGE_DATA_FILESYSTEM_VERSION_HPP
00008 #define SAGA_PACKAGE_DATA_FILESYSTEM_VERSION_HPP

00014 #include <saga/saga/util.hpp>
00015 #include <saga/saga/version.hpp>
00016 #include <saga/saga/packages/filesystem/config.hpp>
00017 
00019 //  The version of the SAGA file package
00020 //
00021 //  SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_FULL & 0x0000FF is the sub-minor version
00022 //  SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_FULL & 0x00FF00 is the minor version
00023 //  SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_FULL & 0xFF0000 is the major version
00024 //
00025 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_FULL         SAGA_VERSION_FULL
00026 
00027 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_MAJOR        SAGA_VERSION_MAJOR
00028 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_MINOR        SAGA_VERSION_MINOR
00029 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_SUBMINOR     SAGA_VERSION_SUBMINOR
00030 
00031 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_DATE         SAGA_VERSION_DATE
00032 
00033 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_SUBMINORMASK SAGA_VERSION_SUBMINORMASK
00034 
00036 //  The SAGA file package API version: here V1.0.0
00037 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_API          SAGA_VERSION_API
00038 
00040 //
00041 //  SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_ISCOMPATIBLE()
00042 // 
00043 //  The SAGA_VERSION_ISCOMPATIBLE macro tests, if the version of the loaded
00044 //  SAGA engine is compatible with the version the calling application was 
00045 //  compiled against.
00046 //
00047 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_ISCOMPATIBLE_EX(version)                    \
00048     (((version) & ~SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_SUBMINORMASK) >=                 \
00049       (SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_FULL & ~SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_SUBMINORMASK)) \
00050   
00051 
00052 #define SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_ISCOMPATIBLE()                              \
00053     SAGA_VERSION_PACKAGE_FILESYSTEM_ISCOMPATIBLE_EX(saga::get_file_package_version()) \
00054   
00055 
00057 namespace saga {
00058 
00059   // Returns the version of the SAGA engine
00060   SAGA_FILESYSTEM_PACKAGE_EXPORT unsigned long get_filesystem_package_version (void);
00061 
00062   // Returns the implemented SAGA API version
00063   SAGA_FILESYSTEM_PACKAGE_EXPORT unsigned long get_filesystem_package_api_version (void);
00064 
00065 } // namespace saga
00067 
00068 #endif // SAGA_PACKAGE_DATA_FILESYSTEM_VERSION_HPP
